tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE LeadCommunicationPreferences (
  lead_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  communication_channel VARCHAR,
  preferred_hours VARCHAR,
  preference_level VARCHAR,
  last_interaction_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE lead_preferences (
    lead_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name TEXT,
    last_name TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    phone_number TEXT,
    preference_1 TEXT,
    preference_2 TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE lead_interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lead_id INT,
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    interaction_type TEXT,
    interaction_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    action VARCHAR(50),
    channel VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
  user_id INT,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  preference_1 BOOLEAN,
  preference_2 BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE interaction_history (
  interaction_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  interaction_date DATE,
  duration_minutes INT
);

CREATE TABLE Interactions (
  interaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id UUID,
  interaction_datetime TIMESTAMP,
  interaction_type TEXT,
  interaction_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Campaigns (
  campaign_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_name TEXT,
  campaign_type TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);
